person.persName: Patrick Upshire Major (Frankfort, Kentucky, attorney and commonwealth's attorney)

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, attorney and commonwealth's attorney. Frankfort native. Son of Samuel I. M. Major and Martha H. Bohannan Major. Member of the Episcopal Church in Frankfort. Educated in Frankfort in the private academy of Burwell B. Sayre. Graduated from Union College in Schenectady, New York in 1842. Founding member of Chi Psi fraternity. Returned to Frankfort. Studied law with Thomas B. Monroe, Sr. and Charles S. Morehead. Admitted to the bar in 1844. Member of the Democratic Party. County attorney for Franklin County from 1852 to 1856. Commonwealth's attorney for the Eighth Judicial District of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1856 to 1862. Member of the Masonic Order in Kentucky.
